Class Drama

java.lang.Object
Movie
Drama
Direct Known Subclasses:
PeriodDrama
public class Drama extends Movie
This class models a specific type of movie, a drama movie.

    • setNumFamousActors

      Parameters:

    • revenue

      public int revenue()
      Given a concrete Drama movie (this), the function computes the revenue (in millions of Euros) of the movie.
      The logic is as follows:
      1 million for every character in the movie title. Plus 5 more millions per each famous actor in the movie.
      Specified by:
      revenue in class Movie
      Returns:
      The revenue of the movie.
